content.text: Hi there! I'm a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing. What do you do for a living?
Hi! I work in a doctor's office. I recently got divorced, so I'm trying to find a new hobby to keep me busy. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to play video games and collect old dolls. I also like to go to the rose garden in my neighborhood.
Oh, I love going to the rose garden in my neighborhood too! I love the smell of the flowers.
I know, right? It's so relaxing.
I'm glad we have something in common.
I'm going to go for a walk in the rose garden now. Do you want to come with me?
